last_action: click on the search icon (typically a magnifier) located at the top-right corner of the screen.
reflect_result: By clicking on the search icon, you have moved to the search bar screen. This allows you to enter search queries, such as searching for the app "Google Translate." While this step is important for finding the app, it does not directly contribute to uninstalling "Google Translate." To complete the user request, you would need to search for "Google Translate," select it from the search results, and proceed to uninstall the app. Therefore, this action is part of the process but hasn't yet made direct progress towards uninstalling the app.
